footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Passive Talents: Tighnari

fields.name: Encyclopedic Knowledge
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> For every point of Elemental Master Tighnari possesses, his Charged Attack and Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft DMG are increased by 0.05%. The maximum DMG Bonus obtainable this way is 50%.

fields.name: Keen Sight
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> After Tighnari fires a Wreath Arrow, his Elemental Mastery is increased by 50 for 4 seconds.

fields.name: Scholarly Blade
fields.value:
*Unlocked Automatically*
> Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Sumeru on the mini-map
